newsitem.title: ZAMBIA: ZCCM copper, cobalt output drops in Feb.
newsitem.headline: ZCCM copper, cobalt output drops in Feb.

text.p: Zambia Consolidated Copper Mines (ZCCM) Ltd's copper and cobalt production fell in February from January, according to provisional figures from the central bank.
The figures, released on Wednesday, showed that copper production fell to 22,190 tonnes from 27,619 tonnes in January, with exports dropping to 25,492 tonnes from 28,035 tonnes.
Cobalt production fell to 331 tonnes from 366 tonnes in January.
Cobalt exports in February were 314 tonnes from 371 tonnes in January.
